reviews.text: Stayed for two nights in hotel Beranek with a group of girlfriends. They were very accomodating, put us in rooms side by side. Everything was clean, simple and without fault. Buffet breakfast was adequate and staff were friendly and helpful. A 10 minute walk to Wenclas square and 10min taxi to Old Town Square. We used the hotel taxi service which we found was a good price. Overall it catered for all our needs.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable and Convinient

likes.disliked: — Location wasn't dead centre, but thats why it was cheaper!

reviews.text: This is an exact copy that I sent to the General Manager at Beranek Hotel.
reviews.title: A Perfect Stay
Loved everything about it!
reviews.text: I am sending you this e-mail to say a big thank you and congratulations for the wonderful service you provide at Hotel Beránek.

reviews.title: Newer and a good value
reviews.text: My friend and myself had booked a Flyaway package with Air Malta which included accommodation at the City Club Hotel in Sokolska Street. When we checked in (on 15 August), we were told that it was overbooked (even though we had booked and confirmed in April) and that they arranged for us to stay at Hotel Beránek from 15 to 22 August 2007.

Some twenty or so friends stayed at the Hotel for two nights 5th - 7t February this year. The rates were great and we were all suprisee at the standard of the hotel as it had been recently renovated. The rooms were warm and more importantly clean better than some ive been to. Each room has a fantastic bathroom with either a shower or a bath. Breakfast is continental 0730 hrs until 1030 hrs but if you miss it KFC and McDONALDS are accross the road. The hotel is about 10 minutes walk from the main square and all of the shops Its a bit of a walk to the old town but its down hill get a taxi back..
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.disliked: — police cars racing by at night with horns going

reviews.text: Over all the hotel and staff were fantastic and i would go back..
reviews.title: OK at a push
Good vlalue hotel
reviews.text: Beware the local Police like to use there sirens and Blue lights on a regular basis wether it is attending an emergency or trying to get through traffic so they can go home they use them and it can be a bit noisy at the frnt of the hotel
